SEARCH
Package application.client

Class Heap

java.lang.Object
application.client.Heap
public class Heap extends Object
Represents a Heap data structure implemented using an ArrayList. This class provides methods for heap operations such as insertion, deletion, and searching. It also supports reading data from a file and implementing the A* search algorithm.
Author:
JM Molomo, D MASINE, A NKANYANA, DN MBOYI

    • aStarSearchRange

      public List<Integer> aStarSearchRange(ArrayList<HeapNode> heap, int target)
      Performs a modified A* search to find keys within ±5 of the target.
      Parameters:
      heap - The heap ArrayList.
      target - The target key.
      Returns:
      A list of indices of nodes within the range.
